Description:
Detects the creation of the default output filename used by the wmiexec tool

Author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Wmiexec Default Output File
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where filepath re '\\Windows\\__1\d{9}\.\d{1,7}$' and filepath re 'C:\\__1\d{9}\.\d{1,7}$' and filepath re 'D:\\__1\d{9}\.\d{1,7}$'
